channel.title: Source Summit: P2P Ed
channel.description:
I'm starting to think about a Source Summit for Source! To avoid getting too meta, to central topic is simply P2P education. Here are the communities I'd like to convene:
* guilds * university educators * accelerators and co-working spaces * brokers * curators * consultants * ed tech * venture builders * journalists * film-makers * story-tellers * portfolio managers in NGOs, World Bank, etc. * peer-to-peer technologists * nomads and adventurers * historians * ethnographers

item.title: Source Summit: P2P Ed
item.dc:creator: @salim Salim Virani
item.description:
@salim wrote:

I’m starting to think about a Source Summit for Source! To avoid getting too meta, to central topic is simply P2P education. Here are the communities I’d like to convene:
